Name: LLP017 Change to Use Customer Recorded
Output_template:
{"lookup_validation":"0","secure_fields_db_database":"","results_page_columns_db":"","escapeTokens":"yes","systemName":"Firmstep Solutions Read","query":"Select *
From
(select
	{flat} as flat_out,
	{house} as house_out,
	{street} as street_out,
	{town} as town_out, 
	IF({country} IS NULL or {country} = '' or {country} = 'United Kingdom', {postcode}, '') as postcode_out5,
	IF({country} IS NOT NULL and {country} != '' and {country} != 'United Kingdom', {postcode}, '') as zIPPostcode,
	{country} as country_out,
	{uprn} as uprn_out,
	{lng} as lng_out,
	{lat} as lat_out,
	1 as existSelected,
	1 as existingCustomer,
	'ProcAi' as haveRun
Union select
	'' as flat_out,
	'' as house_out,
	'' as street_out,
	'' as town_out, 
	'' as postcode_out5,
	'' as zIPPostcode,
	'' as country_out,
	'' as uprn_out,
	'' as lng_out,
	'' as lat_out,
	'' as existSelected,
	'' as existingCustomer,
	'ProcAi' as haveRun) as Comb
Where
	IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), 1, '') = Comb.existSelected","systemID":"59dc224eb4f63"}
